sentences.sentence: It is constantly out to prove to us the inadvisability of challenging its power.
sentences.translation: 它在不停地向我们证明了它是死不悔改，并且妄图挑战的力量。

sentences.sentence: The inadvisability of trying to discard this false view by referring to the Buddhist doctrine is obvious, for the non-Buddhists cannot be expected to have any faith in the teachings of the Buddha.
sentences.translation: 以佛教的观点来否定这样的见解很明显是不适当的，非佛教徒不能预期他对佛陀的教法有信心。
